query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/OrderList.vue` that:

1. Receives an `orders` array prop with items containing `id` (number), `customerName` (string), `total` (number), and `isPending` (boolean)
2. Receives an `isExpanded` boolean prop that controls whether the order details are shown
3. When `isExpanded` is true, displays only pending orders (where `isPending` is true)
4. Each order item should display the customer name and total
expected_behavior: Does not use v-if and v-for on the same element
Uses computed property for filtering pending orders
